CLAN-QUIRK-coyotecic.name: Clan
CLAN-QUIRK-coyotecic.description:
The way the Clans fought was well reflected in the designs of their Battlemechs, often being shown by how quick and maneuverable they were.

C.A.S.E. protection on all components.

coyotekinshwlr.name: HWLR
coyotekinshwlr.description: The HWLR is able to hold more SRM missiles then normal

coyotekinsblue.name: BLU
coyotekinsblue.description: The BLU has an advanced AMS system

PPC-Platformnullll.name: PPC Platform
PPC-Platformnullll.description: This 'Mech was designed to be a Particle Projection Cannon platform, and has improved PPC efficiency
PPC-Platformnullll.comment: generic version of awesome PPC quirk
